Uses of Class
peregrine.util.IdempotentFunction

Packages that use IdempotentFunction
peregrine.io.util IO utilities, usually for dealing with multiple files, closing resoures, etc. 
peregrine.merge   
peregrine.os Operating system specific extentions including mlock, fadvise, fallocate, etc. 
peregrine.reduce.sorter Sort engine for the reducer. 
peregrine.util Util classes for use (crypto, queues, etc). 
 

Uses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.io.util
 

Subclasses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.io.util
 class BaseCloser<T>
          Implements JDK 1.7 try-with-resources style closing for multiple Closeables.
 class Closer
          Implements JDK 1.7 try-with-resources style closing for multiple Closeables.
 class Flusher
          Flusher similar to Closer which calls Flusher.flush().
 

Uses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.merge
 

Subclasses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.merge
 class MergeRunner
          Run a merge by taking to chunk readers and blending them into a merge stream.
 

Uses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.os
 

Subclasses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.os
 class BaseMappedFile
           
 class ByteBufferCloser
          A closeable which is smart enough to work on byte buffers.
 class FileMapper
          Facade on top of mlock/mmap that opens up a file, mmaps it, then mlocks it (optionally).
 class MappedFileReader
          Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources in the foreground via close() without having to wait for the GC.
 class MappedFileWriter
          Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources.
 

Uses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.reduce.sorter
 

Subclasses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.reduce.sorter
 class KeyLookup
          Maintains a key lookup system from the ChunkReader and backing ChannelBuffer to the offset of the key in the channel buffer.
 

Uses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.util
 

Subclasses of IdempotentFunction in peregrine.util
 class IdempotentCloser
          A function that is idempotent.
